cards.name: ARX-04-MK-X Defender
cards.loadout: Each model is equipped with: 1 Contraves II Autocannons; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Skyfire Protocols
other.description: Each time you target this unit with the Overwatch Stratagem just after an enemy unit that can Fly starts or ends a Normal, Advance or Fall Back move, when resolving that Stratagem, in addition to shooting that enemy unit, you can select up to three additional enemy units within 24" of this model that can Fly; models in this unit can also shoot at each of those units with their Contraves II Autocannons (provided each one is an eligible target), but when doing so, an unmodified Hit roll of 6 is required to score a hit.

cards.name: SDR-04-MK-XII Phalanx
cards.loadout: Each model is equipped with: 1 Contraves II Autocannons; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Target Saturation
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes a ranged attack that targets a unit that is not Below Half-strength, you can re-roll the Hit roll.

cards.name: MBR-04-MK-IV Tomahawk
cards.loadout: Each model is equipped with: 1 Anti-Air Missile Pod; 1 Anti-Infantry Array; 2 Missile Pods; 2 Particle Beam Cannons; 1 Armored Feet.

other.name: Purpose Built
other.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets a Monster or Vehicle unit, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

cards.name: MBR-07-MK-II Spartan
cards.loadout: Each model is equipped with: 1 Anti-Infantry Array; 2 Missile Pods; 1 Claw Hands.
wargear: Any number of models can each have their Claw Hands replaced with 1 Anti-Armor Club.

other.name: Giant Killer
other.description: In the Fight phase, when targeting a Vehicle or a Monster, models from this unit score Critical Wounds on a 5+.

cards.name: VF-1A Valkyries
cards.loadout: Each model is equipped with: 1 GU-11 Gunpod; 1 Armored Feet.
wargear: Any number of models can each be equipped with 1 [Equipment Pack] unit.

abilities.name: Battloid Mode
abilities.description: Before the first turn and at the beginning of each of your Command phases, this unit must choose a Mode for all models to enter (including attached Character models).

abilities.name: Battloid Mode
abilities.description: Until the beginning of your next Command phase, return all characteristics to their printed values.

abilities.name: Fighter Mode
abilities.description: Until the beginning of your next Command phase, this unit gains the [Aircraft] and [Fly] keywords, it's Objective Controlled characteristic becomes 0, and it's Movement characteristic becomes 20+".

abilities.name: Gerwalk Mode
abilities.description: Until the beginning of your next Command phase, this unit gains the [Fly] keyword, it's Objective Controlled characteristic becomes 2, and it's Movement characteristic becomes 20".

other.name: Laser CIWS
other.description: Models in this unit have the 6+ Feel No Pain ability against ranged attacks.

cards.name: Squad Leader
cards.leader: This model can be attached to the following unit: ■ VF-1A Valkyries

wargear: This model can be equipped with 1 [Equipment Pack] unit.

abilities.name: Gerwalk Mode

other.name: Coordinated Fire Arcs
other.description: While this model is leading a unit, weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

other.name: Laser CIWS
other.description: This model has the 6+ Feel No Pain ability against ranged attacks.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above unit only if it contains 2 or more models.

other.name: Second Set of Eyes
other.description: For any ranged attacks that target this model, or models it a unit it is Leading, reduce the AP by 1.

other.description: This model has the 6+ Feel No Pain ability against ranged attacks.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above unit only if it contains 2 or more models. You can attach this model to one of the above units even if one Squad Leader model has already been attached to it. If you do, and that Bodyguard unit is destroyed, the Leader units attached to it become separate units, with their original Starting Strengths.

other.name: Skull Leader (Psychic)
other.description: At the start of your Shooting phase, select one enemy unit within 12" of this model. That enemy unit must take a Battle-shock test.

leads.extra: You can attach this model to the above unit only if it contains 2 or more models.

abilities.name: Equipment Pack
abilities.description: If you have upgraded a model to have an [Equipment Pack] unit, attach the appropriate [Equipment Pack] unit to your model as a reminder. These do not count as models for any rules purposes.  Increase the base cost of that model by the cost of this unit.

abilities.name: Armored Pack
abilities.description: This model gains the [Lone Operative] ability; may not Lead any units; must always choose Battloid Mode; increases its Toughness characteristic to 10; reduces its Speed characteristic to 10"; adds 6 to the bearer's Wounds characteristic.

abilities.name: Character Locked
abilities.description: This unit may only be equipped to a [Character] model.

abilities.name: Wargear
abilities.description: This model gains the following wargear: 4 Micro-Missile Clusters; 1 Heavy Missile Clusters.

other.name: Ejection
other.description: At any time, the bearer of this [Equipment Pack] may eject it.  If it does so: any weagear, abilities, and/or keywords from this unit are lost; all characteristics return to their printed values; that model regains up to 6 lost Wounds, not to exceed its printed Wounds characteristic.

abilities.name: Equipment Pack
abilities.description: If you have upgraded a model to have an [equipment pack] unit, attach the appropriate [equipment pack] unit to your model as a reminder. These do not count as models for any rules purposes.  Increase the base cost of that model by the cost of this unit.

abilities.name: FAST Pack
abilities.description: This model gains the [fly] keyword; gains the [STEALTH] ability; adds 6" to the bearer's Move characteristic; adds 3 to the bearer's Wounds characteristic.

abilities.name: Character Bonus
abilities.description: If this unit is attached to a [character] model, improve each weapon’s Ballistic Skill characteristic by 1. If the model is also an [epic hero], improve each weapon's Attacks characteristic by +1.

abilities.name: Wargear
abilities.description:
This model gains the following wargear: 2 Micro-Missile Clusters.
If this unit is attached to a [character] model, you may replace 1 Micro-Missile Clusters with 1 Twin Particle Beam Cannon.
This model may additionally take 1 Missile Pack [equipment pack].

other.name: Ejection
other.description: At any time, the bearer of this [equipment pack] may eject it.  If it does so: any weagear, abilities, and/or keywords from this unit are lost; all characteristics return to their printed values; that model regains up to 3 lost Wounds, not to exceed its printed Wounds characteristic.

wargear.name: Anti-Air Missiles
wargear.description: When targeting a unit that can [Fly], add +1 to the hit roll for this weapon.

abilities.name: Equipment Pack
abilities.description: If you have upgraded a model to have an [Equipment Pack] unit, attach the appropriate [Equipment Pack] unit to your model as a reminder. These do not count as models for any rules purposes.  Increase the base cost of that model by the cost of this unit.

abilities.name: Wargear
abilities.description: This model can be equipped with up to two of the following, and can take duplicates: ◦ 1 Anti-Air Missile Clusters ◦ 1 Heavy Missiles ◦ 1 Micro-Missile Clusters

abilities.name: Character Bonus
abilities.description: If this unit is attached to a [Character] model, improve each weapon’s Ballistic Skill characteristic by 1. If the model is also an [Epic Hero], improve each weapon's Attacks characteristic by +1.
